name: WP Skin @ Home
author: Joan Ballester @joanballester (Embat @embat_es)

sections.description:
This is a plugin that allow you to put a banner (skin, an image and a link) behind the divs in your home page. Initially developed by http://embat.es to use in http://theventan.com, but it’s free to use now.

Arbitrary section

None

A brief Markdown Example

None
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to “Settings > WP Skin @ Home”

short_description: This is a plugin that allow you to put a banner (skin, an image and a link) behind the divs in your home page.
